
{{alias}}( str )
    Converts a string to kebab case.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Kebab-cased string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'Hello World!' )
    'hello-world'
    > out = {{alias}}( 'I am a tiny little teapot' )
    'i-am-a-tiny-little-teapot'

    See Also
    --------
